extendedInfo.description: White Dragon rule the beautiful crystal of snow.The wallpapers of White Dragon are seven types.This app can be used "Dream Monday Family Points".*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->White Dragon CrystalFull versionhttps://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall2.SnowCrystal02*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.
